title: trying to make new friends
body: Hello, im a new league of legends player and i was wondering if any of u guys would want to play with me, my summoner name is highonshrooms. Also if you have any tips just leave a comment, thanks

replies.body: i think u are smurf, "highonshroom" teemo main confirm gg report

Don't put /all chat on

That's my only tip to you.

> [{quoted}](name=JustTrash,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=fpzLoKhA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-07T03:10:26.283+0000)
>
> Don't put /all chat on
> 
> That's my only tip to you.

but how do you call them scrubs when they beat you in lane 10/0 with no jungle help

umm...

Be mature.

Oh wait, this is OCE.

Don't reply to people who are flaming just ignore it, you can mute but they might make some good calls and you can't see them just report after.

Always ping a warning when your lane opponent is missing.

Don't call people scrubs it's not nice I was just joking below and don't go GG EZ when you win/lose a hard game it just shows how incompetent you are.

Be nice have fun don't flame if you lose just get better.

Practice makes perfect but perfection is not always good to begin with, as you need to make mistakes to learn.

If you see Molendo3 run. (JKS)

I think that covers most of it enjoy.
